text.div:
AnimalSpecies

This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate species of animal patients.

This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/animal-species

CodeDisplayDefinition
canislfDogCanis lupus familiaris
ovisaSheepOvis aries
serinuscdDomestic CanarySerinus canaria domestica

name: AnimalSpecies
description: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate species of animal patients.
